Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the office of fire prevention and control to establish the New York state rural ambulance services task force
Summary: Authorizes the office of fire prevention and control to establish the New York state rural ambulance services task force; and requires such task force to conduct a study on the unique challenges faced by New York state ambulance services in rural areas and possible long term solutions to such challenges.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing the New York state rural ambulance services task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
